title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 116.3 - Field inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 116.3 - Field inspection

State Regulations
(a) A
seedling inspection will be made by an authorized field man during the first
season of planting. (b) At least
one field inspection will be made each year certification is
requested. (c) Seed from fields on
which no inspection has been made will not be eligible to tag as certified
seed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
116.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
